thread.title: Pamela May Proctor
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Pamela May Proctor

author: Pamela May Proctor
title: Pamela May Proctor
text: I recently used Redspot in Brisbane airport on recommendation from a friend. I left my wallet in the car and realised when I was in the airport about to board. Two days later it had been express posted to me, intact with cash and cards. Can't speak highly enough about the service.
